title: In The Thick of It!!!
text: From start to finish this was a good deal!Good service and sensational location! Rooms & elevators are on the small side - however to walk out and into the thick of the Mag Mile was exceptional! No robe in the bathroom as advertised.All other room amenities were above average -cleanliness of rooms - cd - hotel staff and restaurant! I'd stay here again in a heartbeat!
